description: Displays detailed information about a job run. A job run is a unit of work, such as a Spark jar, PySpark script, or SparkSQL query, that you submit to Amazon EMR on EKS.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the job run request.

parameters.name: virtualClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual cluster for which the job run is submitted.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the job run.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the job run.

nested_items.name: virtualClusterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the job run's virtual cluster.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of job run.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the job run.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: The client token used to start a job run.

nested_items.name: executionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The execution role ARN of the job run.

nested_items.name: releaseLabel
nested_items.description: The release version of Amazon EMR.

nested_items.name: configurationOverrides
nested_items.description: The configuration settings that are used to override default configuration.

nested_items.name: applicationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configurations for the application running by the job run.

nested_items.name: classification
nested_items.description: The classification within a configuration.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: A set of properties specified within a configuration classification.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: configurations
nested_items.description: A list of additional configurations to apply within a configuration object.

nested_items.name: monitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configurations for monitoring.

nested_items.name: managedLogs
nested_items.description: The entity that controls configuration for managed logs.

nested_items.name: allowAWSToRetainLogs
nested_items.description: Determines whether Amazon Web Services can retain logs.

nested_items.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the encryption key for logs.

nested_items.name: persistentAppUI
nested_items.description: Monitoring configurations for the persistent application UI.

nested_items.name: cloudWatchMonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: Monitoring configurations for CloudWatch.

nested_items.name: logGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the log group for log publishing.

nested_items.name: logStreamNamePrefix
nested_items.description: The specified name prefix for log streams.

nested_items.name: s3MonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: Amazon S3 configuration for monitoring log publishing.

nested_items.name: logUri
nested_items.description: Amazon S3 destination URI for log publishing.

nested_items.name: containerLogRotationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Enable or disable container log rotation.

nested_items.name: rotationSize
nested_items.description: The file size at which to rotate logs. Minimum of 2KB, Maximum of 2GB.

nested_items.name: maxFilesToKeep
nested_items.description: The number of files to keep in container after rotation.

nested_items.name: jobDriver
nested_items.description: Parameters of job driver for the job run.

nested_items.name: sparkSubmitJobDriver
nested_items.description: The job driver parameters specified for spark submit.

nested_items.name: entryPoint
nested_items.description: The entry point of job application.

nested_items.name: entryPointArguments
nested_items.description: The arguments for job application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: sparkSubmitParameters
nested_items.description: The Spark submit parameters that are used for job runs.

nested_items.name: sparkSqlJobDriver
nested_items.description: The job driver for job type.

nested_items.name: entryPoint
nested_items.description: The SQL file to be executed.

nested_items.name: sparkSqlParameters
nested_items.description: The Spark parameters to be included in the Spark SQL command.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job run was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the job run.

nested_items.name: finishedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job run has finished.

nested_items.name: stateDetails
nested_items.description: Additional details of the job run state.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: The reasons why the job run has failed.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: retryPolicyConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the retry policy that the job runs on.

nested_items.name: maxAttempts
nested_items.description: The maximum number of attempts on the job's driver.

nested_items.name: retryPolicyExecution
nested_items.description: The current status of the retry policy executed on the job.

nested_items.name: currentAttemptCount
nested_items.description: The current number of attempts made on the driver of the job.
